content: Jig saw blades for wood (curves) Double-sided jig saw blade for cutting very tight curves in soft wood, plywood and OSB ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Saw blades- - - ### FEATURES:Features Cut smaller radii – unique double-sided jig saw blade makes even tighter curves possible Cleaner cuts will less splintering – achieve especially neat results without sanding thanks to the blades precision-ground teeth Applications Clean cutting of especially tight curves in soft wood, plywood and OSB For use with all jig saws with a T-shank blade clamp ### TECHNICAL DATA: Product Class: Ultimate Base material: Softwood (fir, pine etc.), Plywood, Chipboard, Fibre board Blade features: Curved cut Technical Data | Product Class | Ultimate | Base material | Softwood (fir, pine etc.), Plywood, Chipboard, Fibre board | Blade features | Curved cut | Blade material | HCS | Teeth per inch | 6 | Shank | Single lug shank (T-shank) | Tooth pitch | 4 mm | Toothed section length | 2.95 in | Blade length | 4 in ### ITEMS- 2332305 - Jig saw blade SPX 75 (5) double curve - Package Size 5 pc
